ability.Serene Grace: This Pokemon's secondary effect chances are doubled.

Heart Swap.effect: Has a 20% chance to lower the target's Special Defense by 1 stage.

Iron Bash.effect: Has a 30% chance to make the target flinch.

Lunar Wish.effect: Heals the user by 50% of its maximum HP and removes all status conditions.

Meteor Strike.effect: Has a 30% chance to reduce the target's Speed by 1 stage.
